attributes.action: consider drunkeness in public to be deemed a civil offence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Laws now allow people to drink all hours they wish.   However, it is a criminal offence to drive any vehicle under the influence of certain levels of alcohol intake.  This should be extended to pedestrians - who can cause road accidents to themselves and innocent motorists.   Until the RESPONSIBILITY of remaining in a sober state in public places is linked with this FREEDOM to drink, problems will exist.  These cause extreme strains on the NHS and police who have to work extremely unsociable hours - costing taxpayers millions - to accomodate this unsocial behaviour.
